string.value: You need to go see the pack of wolves that are here to meet #t1902016#. They are apparently waiting at #b#m914030000##k, which is connected to #b#m140010100##k.

#p1202008# thanked you for raising their baby pup, but demanded that you return #t1902016# to them. When you told them you weren't interested in returning him, the wolf decided to give you a test to see if you're worthy of raising a wolf. Now you just need to eliminate all the #o9300354#s #p1202008# has summoned.
You passed the test, but #p1202008# still seems to want a word with you...
Did you defeat all the #o9300354#s? That's amazing. I have the utmost respect for your immense power. You have just passed the test of the wolves.
That being said…regardless of the test, if you just bring that kid along for the ride…its life may be in grave danger…
You have yet to pass the test. It's simple: #rbeat all of my wolves#k! If you can do that, then I'll accept you.
